name: BELLRINGER
description:
◈ ◉ ◈ BELLRINGER ◈ ◉ ◈

[ Made in 48 Hours ]

You are a sentient bell in a haunted clock tower, you have one minute to scale as much of the tower as you can!

Collect purple time bells along the way to temporarily slow down time and climb higher!

◈ ◉ ◈ Instructions ◈ ◉ ◈

Use arrow keys or WASD to move

Push 'space', 'up arrow', 'w' or 'z' to jump

Jump while up against a wall to wall jump.

Walk to the sides of the screen to wrap around to the other side.

Collect purple time bells to temporarily slow down time.

Hold [ALT] + [R] key to reset your highscore data.
